header.description: Dayopt implements the highest standards of security to protect your information.

measures.title: Security Measures Implemented
measures.https: HTTPS Enforcement: All communications encrypted with TLS 1.3
measures.mfa: Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA): TOTP (Time-based One-Time Password) support
measures.rateLimit: Rate Limiting: Brute force attack prevention
measures.sqlInjection: SQL Injection Protection: Prisma ORM + parameterized queries
measures.xss: XSS Protection: React automatic escaping + Content Security Policy
measures.csrf: CSRF Protection: SameSite Cookie + token verification
measures.dependencies: Dependency Management: Weekly checks with Dependabot
measures.monitoring: Error Monitoring: Real-time monitoring with Sentry
